Tests

Class TestRequirements

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tests.TestRequirements

  • public class TestRequirements
extends java.lang.Object
    TestRequirements is the test class for this unoGame, it handles all tests to meet the set requirements.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    vikfll-0

      • MultiplePlus4

        public void MultiplePlus4()
        Test if the game performs multiple draw 4 cards when a player plays multiple plus4 cards. This checks internal state of player.

      • MultiplePlus4Transmit

        public void MultiplePlus4Transmit()
        Test if the game performs multiple draw 4 cards when a player plays multiple plus4 cards. This checks outgoing transmit to player updating of its state.
